text: == Events == *The Long Parliament passes a series of laws written to help keep Charles I's absolutist policies. * August 10 – Charles I of England runs from London to the north * Irish Rebellion of 1641 – revolt of the Gaelic Irish in Ulster against the English settlers *The Dutch found a trading colony on Dejima, near Nagasaki, Japan. *Portugal is ousted from Malacca by the Dutch. *Claudio Monteverdi's opera Il ritorno d'Ulisse in patria is first performed. *Moses Amyraut's De l'elevation de la foy et de l'abaissement de la raison en la creance des mysteres de la religion is published. *The Norwegian city of Kristiansand was founded by King Christian IV
